author: Unreal Engine
description:
In this session recorded at Unreal Fest Bali 2025, Daniel Mor of Virtuos provides an in-depth look at the power of procedural generation in Unreal Engine 5, walking through the entire process of creating dynamic cities and buildings using the PCG (Procedural Content Generation) framework. 

From crafting modular assets to designing flexible grammar rules, this session explores how to automate the creation of complex environments. Hereng also shares key insights on packaging Blueprints, optimizing workflows, and a variety of tips and tricks to streamline your development process. 

Whether you’re new to procedural generation or looking to level up your skills, this session will equip you with the tools to build scalable, immersive cities with ease.

#PCG, #ProceduralContentGeneration, #BlueprintVisualScripting, #Virtuos, #UE5, #UnrealEngine, #UnrealFestBali
Learn more about the PCG framework in Unreal Engine here: dev.epicgames.com/documentation/unreal-engine/procedural-content-generat
title: Leveraging PCG for Building and City Creation | Unreal Fest Bali 2025

author: Unreal Engine
description:
Every successful Unreal Engine developer is a sum of all the tips and tricks they’ve picked up along the way to debug their projects. 

From the mundane to the under-utilized, take a rapid-fire adventure through many of the tools available in the Unreal Engine for debugging and solving issues in this session recorded at Unreal Fest Bali. 

Learn more about Unreal Engine here: unrealengine.com

#Debugging, #UnrealEngine, #UE5, #UnrealFestBali
title: Debugging Unreal Engine Projects: Lightning Round | Unreal Fest Bali 2025

author: Unreal Engine
description:
The MetaHuman plugin for Unreal Engine empowers users to craft highly realistic characters, pose them, and animate them directly within the MetaHuman framework. 

In this session recorded at Unreal Fest Bali 2025, we'll take you on a tour of some of the new updates we’ve made to the MetaHuman framework that allow for even more customization and better optimized performance. 

Learn how to maximize MetaHuman’s performance and discover how it’s a reliable and viable solution for real-time projects—even on low-end platforms.

Learn more about the MetaHuman framework here: metahuman.com

#MetaHuman, #DigitalHumans, #MetaHumanCreator, #UnrealFestBali
title: Creating Performant MetaHuman Characters in Unreal Engine | Unreal Fest Bali 2025
